    • Uses of VolumeChoosingPolicy in org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.fsdataset

      Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.fsdataset that implement VolumeChoosingPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AvailableSpaceVolumeChoosingPolicy<V extends FsVolumeSpi>
      A DN volume choosing policy which takes into account the amount of free space on each of the available volumes when considering where to assign a new replica allocation.
      class  RoundRobinVolumeChoosingPolicy<V extends FsVolumeSpi>
      Choose volumes in round-robin order.
